metadata.title: USN-5885-1 -- APR vulnerability
metadata.description: Ronald Crane discovered integer overflow vulnerabilities in the Apache Portable Runtime (APR) that could potentially result in memory corruption. A remote attacker could possibly use these issues to cause a denial of service or execute arbitary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5885-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libapr1 - 1.7.0-8ubuntu0.22.04.1 libapr1-dev - 1.7.0-8ubuntu0.22.04.1 No subscription required
